title: The Science of Climate Change - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/1/17
itunes:title: The Science of Climate Change - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/1/17
description:
George Noory and guest Joe Olson discuss the disputed facts behind the theory of manmade climate change and how he believes President Trump's decision to remove America from the Paris Climate Accord was a good idea.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
